cast.name: 约胡鲁·威廉斯 Yohuru Williams
肯·艾伦·尼利 Ken Allen Neely
保罗·弗里德曼 Paul Freedman

this_title: The Food That Built America Season 2
trans_title: 造就美国的食物 第二季
introduction: For generations of Americans, food entrepreneurs like James Kraft, Milton Hershey, the Swanson family, and the McDonald brothers have literally been household names, but you don’t know their stories. Before they were brands, they were brilliant, sometimes ruthless visionaries who revolutionized food and changed the landscape of America forever. This series turns the lens on an iconic selection of bold pioneers behind such iconic foods as Oreo, Cheetos, pizza, and more.
chinese_title: 造就美国的食物 第二季
foreign_title: The Food That Built America Season 2
